title: The herald of the end of antibiotics has come
body: According to the [washington post](https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/to-your-health/wp/2016/05/26/the-superbug-that-doctors-have-been-dreading-just-reached-the-u-s/) someone up in pennsylvania just was diagnosed with an antibiotic resistant strain of e-coli.  Humanity misused its best defense against disease and in the near future, it'll be gone.  Scary times are coming.
